title: Padre Island National Seashore: Cooperating Association
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park     Cooperating Association              Cooperating Association         Western National Parks Association (WNPA) Bookstore at Malaquite Visitor Center. NPS Photo  The National Seashore's cooperating association is Western National Parks Association, which is a non-profit organization. All proceeds are returned to more than 63 affiliated parks in eleven western states to fund educational, scientific, and research programs not supported by taxes.  At the Malaquite Visitor Center, WNPA operates a store which offers postcards, posters, magnets, bookmarks, sun care products, and personal hygiene items in addition to a wide variety of books. For more information contact the park's WNPA representative at (361) 949-8068 or e-mail at wnpa@pais.org. Please follow this link to the WNPA website.
